controller

Class RulesEditorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.RulesEditorController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class RulesEditorController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller class for rulesEditor.fxml. Let's the user manipulate which rules are set. There are actionevents for 18 buttons representing each possible rule of the game. Buttons representing rules that are set are highlighted with color.

      • sortRules

        void sortRules()
        Sorts the rules in ascending order. This is done through Arrays' sort method.

      • okEvent

        public void okEvent()
        Actionevent for the okButton. Sorts the rules through sortRules() before closing the stage.

      • b0Event

        public void b0Event()
        Actionevent for the button representing birth rule 0. Sets the rule state and button highlight state to opposite of what it was.
